Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Enum TurnState

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<TurnState>
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.TurnState
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TurnState>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum TurnState
extends java.lang.Enum<TurnState>
Associates a controller action to the state of the player's turn (this class is symmetrical to model\TurnState)
See Also:
TurnState

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    java.lang.Enum.EnumDesc<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant Description
    CHOOSE_ACTION
    Here, the player has chosen an action (market, dev card purchase or production)
    CLOSE_TRANSACTIONS
    The player has chosen to finalize all transactions (production powers)
    DEV_CARD_PURCHASE
    The player has requested to purchase a development card, the package to use contains the DevCardID, row, col, slotIntheDevCardSpace(saved in event.index) if the transaction fails, tbe PlayerMoveResponse is set to Rejected
    DISCONNECTION
    The player has Disconnected from the server
    FINAL_LEADER_ACTIONS
    Handles a possible final leader action
    INITIAL_LEADER_ACTION
    Handles a possible initial leader action
    MARKET
    The player has requested a specific action on the market board
    PRODUCTION_PHASE
    The player has requested to activate a production power
    SETUP_PLAYER_CHOICES
    Sets up the player's initial choice of resources and leader cards
